script.title: Google API To BigQuery
script.description: Execute any Google API function and store results to BigQuery.
instructions: Enter an api name and version.
Specify the function using dot notation.
Iterate is optional, use if API returns a list of items that are not unpacking correctly.
The [API Key](https://cloud.google.com/docs/authentication/api-keys) may be required for some calls.
The [Developer Token](https://developers.google.com/google-ads/api/docs/first-call/dev-token) may be required for some calls.
Give BigQuery dataset and table where response will be written.

All API calls are based on [discovery document](https://developers.google.com/discovery/v1/reference), for example the [Campaign Manager API](https://developers.google.com/display-video/api/reference/rest/v1/advertisers/list).

field.name: kwargs
field.description: Dictionray object of name value pairs.

field.name: api_key
field.description: Associated with a Google Cloud Project.

field.name: table
field.description: Table to write API call results to.
